Hal2 yg baik :
- Kamar : rata2.
- Sarapan : baik.
- Staff Hotel : baik, ramah.

text:
Great Time at Luwansa  Hotel Manado, It was memorable time. Here it is my review for the Hotel, Hopefully you guys Will find it helpfull. Sorry this is my first time writing a review for  A Hotel 😀

1. Reception service was good. Easy and fast but the staff was less friendly and we had to serve our self for welcoming drink. But, I guess that is not a big deal. I will give 7/10

2. The room is nice and clean with a modern and premium interior , I loved it. The room service was also fast response.   I will give 8/10 for the room. 

3.The room price is affordable, you might paid for 4 Stars Hotel price but the service and the facilites it close to 5 stars Hotel..So I Will give 9/10 for the price that I found through Travel apps.

4. The foods are so great. From the resturant menu until breakfast buffe style was impressed me, even their capcake was delicious. For foods and breakfast, I will give 8.5/10 

5. The Roof Cafe. This is one of my favorite section of the Hotel. From the roof cafe you could see the other part of the city of Manado including the Statue of Yesus Memberkati. It's only recommended to chill here in the evening. They do have stools in pub style and several  big cosy sofa. The only less here was the food takes so long so you have to prepare your self in advance but it taste amazing. I will give 9/10 for the Roof cafe.

6. They do have a small swimming pool and a kiddo pool. There other Hotel in the Town has better swimming pool than this one. So, I will give 6.5/10 for swimming pool.

7. Health Protocol for Covid was impressed me once again. At the restaurant until cafe   they don't have a book for menu, It's all barcode menu. So it's quiet High tech. Wearing a mask inside the building was compolsury and the staff warned you if you did not. I wish they would have a Security in the front of the Lift to make sure people doing social distancing inside the Lift. I will give 8.5/10 for their Health Protocol for Covid.

8. Location. It's quite distance from the prime area of the City you have to use Taxi or Grab/Uber/Indriver apps for in and out the Hotel. It's about 20 minutes from the Airport in the morning but during the traffic time it can be 1 hour from to the Airport. It's not walkable  to the mall or shopping center. 

In General This Hotel is recommended if you travel for Bussines. The price was so good and facilites are more than enough. It's great for 1-2 days staying. I will give 8.5/10 for the General of the 4 stars Hotel. You might Will find the Hotel in other big Cities of Indonesia, give it a try to stay, I am sure you Will not regret. They only a new company for Hotels in Indonesia but it's quiet impressed.

By the way My wife and I had great time😀 and the kiddos enjoyed spent few hours..So Thanks  so Luwansa 🙏

.
title: Great Time at Luwansa Manado

text:
June 12-13, 2021  (checked out around 1pm or so)
Room was okay, obviously everything is still new.  Hot water is lukewarm if you take a shower around the same time as everyone else and the hotel is full.  Breakfast is okay, not a lot of choices and the taste is meh.  In my room (505) the wifi did not reach properly and the signal keeps cutting out.  If you like mountain views (I do), the view is quite nice and enjoyable... if they let you enjoy it.  

So I checked out of the room, and got hungry.  The restaurant/cafe doesn't have anything i want so I ordered delivery food to have lunch at the hotel while enjoying the view one last time.  I was sitting at one of the provided table/chair by the window next to the restaurant (but not at the restaurant).  

I was kicked out of the table because I brought food from outside of the hotel.  So I asked to see the manager to get that policy clarified while I went outside to eat my food (not allowed to sit inside apparently).  I've never been kicked out of the hotel facility for eating there until now.  

The staff members (there was one particular guy and eventually others join in) and security and the head of security ended up surrounding me.  I did not raise my voice or got angry at all, and I was recording our conversation because I felt unsafe.  

The head of security and one of the most focal staff member ended up getting angry and yelled at me.  The "head of security" showed me his badge which was just a piece of printed paper with his name written by hand in marker!  I asked for his business card and he became defensive and demanded I produced my state issued ID card!  He never did show me his business card, perhaps the hotel hires THUGS as heads of security?  I wonder what that says about the rest of the hotel. 

I kept insisting to talk to the manager because I want to hear it from the highest authority at the hotel that it really is the policy of the hotel that I cannot eat my food that I bought outside of the hotel in the hotel premises (except in my room).  Which means I can't enjoy my lunch while enjoying the view, which is the reason I stayed at the hotel.  But all of the staff, security people, and the "head of security" kept refusing to call the manager, they ended up yelling at me and were very threatening.  Remember, I'm alone, by myself, have never raised my voice throughout the whole confrontation.  

When the manager finally came out, I just asked if it's the policy that I can't eat my food, where I should eat my food.  He said that for me, there is a special place where I belong and where I can eat.  He had one of the security people escort me down to the parking basement and had me eat at the drivers' waiting lounge.  Thank you Mr. HOTEL MANAGER for your hospitability.  I wonder how I would be treated by the staff and Mr. HOTEL MANAGER if I was a white guy.  

It had no AC, everyone was smoking, the temperature was hot (not even a fan), no tables to eat at, no view.  

Fine, I finished my food quickly since I was hungry and I just wanted to get done and out of there.  When I finished, I brought the plates and silverware back up to the front desk.  I waited there for 15+ minutes for anyone who were standing around doing nothing to acknowledge me.  But nothing... no one would even give me eye contact. What I needed was someone to get my bags that I stored when I checked out about an hour before.

When I was able to finally get someone's attention, I asked if I can get my bags please.  Instead of helping me to bring the bags to me, they only pointed at the general direction where they were keeping the bags.  I couldn't see my bags, and was asking where my bags were.  All the staff people and security people would do was just point in some general location.  I had to walk a little bit and find it myself.  

when my car arrived, none of the staff helped me with the bags into the car.  

DEFINITELY DO NOT STAY HERE.
title: Hostile staff, impolite, rude, do not stay here
